name: LIA
description:
LIA is a horror game that takes place in a forest. There has been reported paranormal activities going on in this forest for centuries. Witnesses describe a small pale girl that appears out of thin air and disappears in the same manner. In order to stop these disturbances you must bring her to peace by collecting all of her teddy bears that she owned.

Controls:

W,A,S,D/Up,Down,Right,Left Arrows: Walk

F: Turn on/off flashlight

Left Shift: Sprint

Mouse: Look around

Left Click: Collect item
